sections.title: Chronicler (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Chronicler class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Bardic Knowledge (Ex) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Grants the bardic knowledge ability identical to the bard class feature, with levels stacking across classes that grant similar abilities.

sections.title: Deep Pockets (Ex) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Allows carrying unspecified gear worth 100 gp per level that can be retrieved as a full-round action, plus provides encumbrance and concealment bonuses.

sections.title: Master Scribe (Ex) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Adds class level bonus to Linguistics, Profession (scribe), and Use Magic Device checks involving written items, plus allows taking 10 and faster deciphering.

sections.title: Live to Tell the Tale (Ex) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Allows retrying failed saving throws against ongoing conditions a limited number of times per day.

sections.title: Pathfinding (Ex) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to avoid getting lost and escape mazes, plus grants road movement speed in any terrain.

sections.title: Bardic Performance (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Grants bardic performance ability like a bard but at an effective level 2 lower, with levels stacking across similar classes.

sections.title: Improved Aid (Ex) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Increases the bonus provided by the aid another action from +2 to +4.

sections.title: Epic Tales (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Creates written works that grant bardic performance benefits to readers, expending performance rounds and using Profession (scribe) for checks.

sections.title: Whispering Campaign (Ex) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Uses bardic music to create doom effects when denouncing in person, or enthrall effects that shift attitudes when denouncing to others.

sections.title: Inspire Action (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Grants an ally an immediate extra move action at 6th level, upgraded to a standard action at 9th level.

sections.title: Call Down the Legends (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Summons 2d4 4th-level barbarian constructs once per week that serve with complete loyalty, functioning like a bronze horn of Valhalla.

sections.title: Greater Epic Tales (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Enhances epic tales so they can be read aloud by others to activate bardic music effects using the reader's Charisma.

sections.title: Lay of the Exalted Dead (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Summons 1d4+1 5th-level incorporeal barbarian constructs once per week with ghost touch weapons that cause fear in enemies.

sections.title: Announcement of Victory (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Creates a cone effect that damages designated enemies with shout while granting inspire courage to allies.

sections.title: Lift the Spirits (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Upgrades announcement of victory to use greater shout and increases the inspire courage bonus by 1.

sections.title: Unbound Satire (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Grants hideous laughter three times per day and allows causing rage in a target once per day through verbal mockery.

sections.title: Ultimate Ridicule (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: When using unbound satire to enrage a target, causes all other nearby enemies to suffer hideous laughter.

sections.title: Unfettered Movement (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Allows 5-foot steps in difficult terrain and provides dimension door three times per day for self-only teleportation.

sections.title: Dance Through Space (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Enhances unfettered movement to allow taking other creatures when using dimension door teleportation.

sections.title: Shifting Tempo (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Grants haste effects to up to 5 creatures, affecting up to 25 creatures per day total.

sections.title: Overwhelming Rhythm (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Expands shifting tempo to affect 25 creatures per day with either haste or slow effects.

sections.title: Master Impersonator (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Allows assuming another creature's appearance after 1 minute of study, granting veil effects with +20 Disguise bonus but as mirror images.

sections.title: Troupe of Thespians (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Extends master impersonator benefits to a number of creatures equal to Charisma bonus.

sections.title: Move the Rocks (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Magic song that protects construction from attacks and accelerates building work equivalent to multiple workers.

sections.title: Wall of Song (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Doubles the duration and effectiveness of move the rocks protection and construction abilities.

sections.title: Vision of the Organist (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Grants once per day use of legend lore, scrying, or divination spells for information gathering.

sections.title: Fateful Tune (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Enhances vision of the organist to include greater scrying, vision, and foresight once per day each.

sections.title: Harmonies of Perfect Peace (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Targets multiple creatures with lullaby in a 30-foot radius and grants soothing performance ability once per day.

sections.title: Melody of Renewal (Su) (Chronicler)
sections.description: Enhances harmonies of perfect peace to provide mass healing effects through soothing performance.
